meaning: الْأَشْهُرُ الْاثْنَا عَشَرَ الَّتِي تَسْتَخْدِمُ فِي التَّقْوِيمِ الهِجْرِيِّ وَتَبْدَأُ بِشَهْرِ مُحَرَّمٍ
translation: The twelve months used in the Hijri calendar, starting with the month of Muharram
The first month in the Hijri calendar
The second month in the Hijri calendar
The third month in the Hijri calendar
The fourth month in the Hijri calendar
The fifth month in the Hijri calendar
The sixth month in the Hijri calendar
The seventh month in the Hijri calendar
The eighth month in the Hijri calendar

meaning: تَاسِعُ شَهْرٍ فِي التَّقْوِيمِ الهِجري وهُوَ شَهْرُ الصِّيَامِ
translation: The ninth month in the Hijri calendar, known as the month of fasting
The tenth month in the Hijri calendar

meaning: الحَادِي عَشَرَ مِنْ شُهُورِ التَّقْوِيمِ الهِجري
translation: The eleventh month in the Hijri calendar

meaning: الثَّانِي عَشَرَ مِنْ شُهُورِ التَّقْوِيمِ الهِجري
translation: The twelfth month in the Hijri calendar
